text: Arnoldo Foà (24 January 1916 - 11 January 2014) was an Italian movie actor. He has appeared in more than 130 movie since 1938. He was born in Ferrara, Italy. Foà died on the morning of 11 January 2014, 13 days before his 98th birthday, from respiratory failure in his home in Rome, Italy. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1916 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Emilia-Romagna Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease- related deaths in Italy Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:People from Ferrara
title: Arnoldo Foà
